problem: 已知,如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点D,C在⊙O上,连接AD、BD、DC、AC,如果∠BAD=25°,那么∠C的度数是()
answer: 解:∵AB是⊙O的直径,∴∠ADB=90°∵∠BAD=25°,∴∠B=65°∴∠C=∠B=65°(同弧所对的圆周角相等).故选B.
problem_en: It is known that, as shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point D, C are on ⊙O, connect AD, BD, DC, AC, if ∠BAD = N_0, then the degree of ∠C is ()
